inclusion.criterion: review of recent urinalysis and/or urine culture confirming the absence of a recent urinary tract infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At the baseline testing visit, subjects will undergo CPT testing using transcutaneous stimulation in the distribution of the pudendal nerve on the perineum.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients will undergo Stage I of the SNM procedure with their own physician at a subsequent appointment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If subjects have a 50% improvement in their symptoms after 2 weeks with Stage 1 SNM, they will under go Stage II of the SNM procedure.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The subjects will have an appointment scheduled for their follow-up CPT testing at the clinical research office 4 to 6 weeks after the Stage II procedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects will undergo repeat CPT testing using transcutaneous stimulation in the distribution of the pudendal nerve on the perineum.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled to receive SMN therapy by Dr. Peters or Dr. Diokno
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women at least 18 years of age
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Capable and willing to follow all study related procedures (e.g. bladder and urethral catheterization, answering questions during CPT testing, complete questionnaires regarding pertinent medical history).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Currently participating or have participated within the past 30 days in any clinical investigation involving or impacting urinary or renal function.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or intending to become pregnant during the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cannot independently comprehend and complete relevant medical history questionnaires.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The subject is deemed unsuitable for enrollment in this study by the investigators based on their history.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: TENS, PTNS or acupuncture therapy currently being used for symptoms
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures. Severe urethral stricture requiring surgical intervention.
